posts.post_title: PENDING: T213-2 Coupon Ty Cobb Bat Off SGC 4
posts.post_content: Sharp as hell! Presents like a strong 5. Color blows away any T206 of similar pose. Tiny surface wrinkle on upper right side that truly gets lost in the beauty. Asking $5450 via no fee method
